definition: to fish with a hook and bait

sentences.english: Please stay to the solid rock, fishing will be gone.
sentences.chinese: 請留盤石上，垂釣將已矣。

sentences.english: He has often cast this brook.
The river is full of fish and many people go fishing there.
sentences.chinese: 河裏生滿了魚，人們都去垂釣。

sentences.english: It is now used primarily for leisure boating, walking, angling and cycling.
sentences.chinese: 現在主要用於休閒划船，散步，垂釣和騎車。

sentences.english: A fisherman from the neighbouring village.
sentences.chinese: 附近村莊裏的一位垂釣者。

sentences.english: The angler her line into the stream.
sentences.chinese: 那個垂釣者把魚線擲進了小溪裏。

sentences.english: After picnic the children begin to fly kites. Mr. and Mr. Jackson go fishing by the lake.
sentences.chinese: 午餐後孩子們起頭放風箏，傑克遜佳耦在湖邊垂釣。

sentences.english: Others came to fish the streams, pools or ponds.
sentences.chinese: 也有人來到溪流或池塘邊享受垂釣之樂。

sentences.english: A fisherman waits for a bite after casting into the lurid green surface of Xingyun Lake in Yunnan.
sentences.chinese: 圖中爲雲南星雲湖，一位垂釣者正等着魚兒上鉤。

sentences.english: He loves (to go) angling on a fine summer day.
sentences.chinese: 他喜歡在晴朗的夏日去垂釣。

sentences.english: Fishing is my favourite sport , I often fish for hours without catching anything .
sentences.chinese: 釣魚是我喜愛的運動，我常垂釣很長時間而一無所獲。

sentences.english: The fish cringed away from the bait when the wan with the fishing rod coughed.
sentences.chinese: 垂釣者咳嗽了一聲，魚兒便嚇得從釣鉺旁遊走了。

sentences.english: This May picture shows shows Inuit fishermen in Ilulissat Icefjord, Greenland.
sentences.chinese: 圖爲五月因紐特漁民在格陵蘭伊盧利薩特冰灣垂釣。

sentences.english: On his fishing trip, he caught three trouts and a cold.
sentences.chinese: 出外垂釣，釣得鮭魚三條，害了感冒一場。

sentences.english: Some deep-sea angler fish form unusual life partnerships.
sentences.chinese: 一些深海垂釣者形成了意外遇險協作夥伴。

definition: to fish (with line and hook)/to dupe
to fish with a hook and bait
to go for an outing/to go on an excursion
